statements: DELETE FROM policy_renewals_and_cancellations WHERE policy_holder_name = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM policy_renewals_and_cancellations WHERE policy_id = 1001 AND cancellation_reason = 'Customer request';
DELETE FROM policy_renewals_and_cancellations WHERE policy_id = 2003 AND renewal_type = 'automatic';
DELETE FROM policyholders WHERE age < 30 AND email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
DELETE FROM policy_cancellations WHERE cancellation_date < '2022-01-01' AND reason LIKE '%unpaid%' OR policy_number = 'POL123';
DELETE FROM renewals WHERE policy_id = 100 AND renewal_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM policies WHERE policy_type = 'car' AND policy_start_date < '2021-06-01';
DELETE FROM policy_holders WHERE name = 'John Doe';
